phrs.translation: n. 马克·吐温（美国小说家）

sentences.sentence: I did like it very much and it was this story that made me interested in Mark Twains works.
sentences.translation: 我真的非常喜欢这个故事，正是这个故事让我对马克·吐温的作品感兴趣。

sentences.sentence: Not counting the books that had come out the year before and not counting the Mark Twains, William Shakespeares, and other guys whose books were also crowding store shelves.
sentences.translation: 没有算那一年之前出版的书，还没算马克·吐温，威廉·莎士比亚，还有那些书已经挤满了书店书架的别的家伙。

sentences.sentence: The humor in Mark Twains writings is the result of deliberate flout and accidental flout at Grices cooperative principles, and also has its particular implication and result.
sentences.translation: 格赖斯的“合作原则”包含了四个准则，而马克·吐温作品中所体现的幽默却是对“合作原则”的有意或无意违反的结果，有着独特的含义和效果。
